ValidationRule.description: Agency Services required to be filled out ONLY when "inbound" or "agency services" are marked as a service under "Abstrakt Client Services"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( INCLUDES(Abstrakt_Client_Services__c,"Inbound"), INCLUDES(Abstrakt_Client_Services__c,"Agency Services (Excluding Inbound)") )&& RecordType.Name <> 'Sapper_CSS', ISNULL(Agency_Services__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Fill out Agency Services to reflect the program
